document.full_text: libyan state tv showed footage of an apparently healthy muammar gaddafi meeting officials in a tripoli hotel wednesday, ending nearly two weeks of doubt over his fate since a nato air strike killed his son.
document.title: libyan tv shows footage of long-absent gaddafi
lines_and_colors: libyan state tv showed footage of an apparently healthy muammar gaddafi meeting officials in a tripoli hotel wednesday, ending nearly two weeks of doubt over his fate since a nato air strike killed his son.
